login.title: Login to Instigo
login.advice: Welcome back. Please login to your account to access your workspace.

errors.retentionDays: Retention must be between 1 and 180 days

register.title: Create an account
register.accountSuccessfullyCreatedContent: Let's quickly set up your account

sendResetPassword.advice: Please enter the email address associated with your account
sendResetPassword.successMessage: Open the email we've just sent to continue
sendResetPassword.errorMessage: This email is not associated with an account.

expiredInvitation.title: Your invitation has expired
expiredInvitation.advice: Please ask your workspace owner to re-issue your invitation

onboarding.leftSideHeading: A few clicks away from driving success
onboarding.leftSideSubHeading: Start off by validating your information and creating your first workspace
onboarding.welcomeSubMessage: Before we continue, take a quick look to make sure your details are correct. You’ll be using them for signing into Instigo, so make sure they’re in order. Don’t worry, you can edit them anytime from your account settings.
onboarding.createWorkspaceSubMessage: Workspaces are super-groups used to organize your activities on Instigo. Let’s create one.
onboarding.addTeamMembersSubHeading: Invite others to collaborate with you
onboarding.getAdAccountsError: Unfortunately we couldn't find any AdAccount
onboarding.completeOnboardingMessage: Your account information can take up until an hour to completely be fetched!
onboarding.trialPeriodInfo: You will not be charged until the end of your trial period

app.adBlockMessage: Some features might not work properly when an ad blocker is enabled.
app.adBlockMessageTitle: Uh oh, ad block is on

vatValidation.successMessage: The company name has been matched with the provided VAT number
vatValidation.errorMessage: We were unable to verify your VAT number

audience.segmentError: Not all segments are correct, try to edit the targeting!

campaignsDraft.errorDescription: The draft could not be found. Please select another one from this table, or start a new campaign

leadForm.createErrorOnFacebook: Error occurred while creating lead form on Facebook's side
leadForm.createErrorOnInstigo: Error occurred while saving the lead form in the database
leadForm.successOnFacebook: The lead form was successfully created on Facebook!
leadForm.successOnInstigo: The lead form was successfully saved on Instigo!

settings.name: Ad Template Name
settings.nameError: Min. length of 4 letters is required

campaign.adAccount: Define the ad account under which this campaign will be created.
campaign.noAdAccount: There is no ad account for this provider on this workspace.
campaign.adAccountError: Define the ad account under which this campaign will be created.
campaign.campaignGroup: The group where the campaign will be created.
campaign.campaignGroupError: You have to select a campaign group.
campaign.campName: Give your campaign an identifiable name
campaign.buyType: The method by which you pay for and target ads in your campaigns: through dynamic auction bidding, fixed-price bidding, or reach and frequency buying
campaign.objective: Choose what you want people to do when they see your ads. Your campaign objective should align with your overall business goals.
campaign.specialCats: You're required to declare if your ads are about social issues, elections or politics
campaign.campCreateFormErr: The form is invalid. Recheck the fields.
campaign.campCreatedDescription: Campaign with name: {{value}} has been successfully created on {{provider}}.
campaign.campErrorDescription:
Error while creating the campaign "{{campaignName}}" on {{step}} level
error: {{errorTitle}}
{{errorMsg}}

creative.adName: The name of the ad as it will be viewed in reporting
creative.creativeType: The ad formats you can use depend on your advertising objective
creative.promoPage: Your Facebook Page or Instagram account represents your business in ads
creative.igAccount: Select an Instagram account to represent your business in your Instagram ad
creative.adHeadline: The headline will appear in most placements, but its position will vary by placement
creative.adText: The primary text for your ad appears in most placements, though the position varies
creative.adLink: Enter the URL for the web page you want people to visit
creative.adLinkDesc: The description is additional text that appears in some placements. Its position on the ad varies by placement
creative.adLinkDisplay: Show a shortened link instead of your full website URL in some placements
creative.cta: Show a button or link on your ad that represents the action you want people to take
creative.adMedia: The image or video of an ad. Media (an image, video or video thumbnail) with width or height less than 600px is not working. Select media wider or higher than 600px.
creative.adFormat: The format style of the an ad
creative.pixel: Select the a pixel for event tracking
creative.placement: Choose the places to show your ad. The more placements you select, the more opportunities you'll have to reach your target audience and achieve your business goals.
creative.selectIgAccountPlacement: You must select an Instagram account to enable this placement
creative.selectIgAccountNetwork: You must select an Instagram account to enable this network
creative.igIneligiblePost: The selected post is not eligible to be used in Instagram ads
creative.optimizePerformance: On Facebook News Feed, Instagram Feed and Instagram Stories, the carousel card that performs best will be shown first. For all other placements, cards will appear in the order you arrange them.
creative.endCard: Add a card at the end with your Page profile picture
creative.socialErr: Select one promote page or one Instagram account to continue
creative.leadgenForm: Select one of the lead forms in order to continue
creative.events: Select one of the events in order to continue
creative.buildUrlExplain: By adding custom campaign parameters to your URLs, you can better measure campaign performance with your third-party analytics tools
creative.buildUrlSourceExplain: Used to track the primary name of the referer of traffic, typically the name of the platform being used, e.g. Facebook
creative.buildUrlMediumExplain: Technically reserved for the marketing medium. For example ‘cpc’ or ‘referral’. But you can leverage this tag to track audiences
creative.buildUrlContentExplain: Used this for ad level tracking e.g. Lifestyle Image 01. This enables you to segment performance on the creative level

audience.location: Enter one or more global regions, countries, states/regions, cities, postal codes or addresses to show or exclude your ad to people in those locations
audience.gender: Show your ads to either men or women, or select All for both
audience.age: Select the minimum and maximum age of the people who will find your ad relevant
audience.targeting: Define your audience by including or excluding demographics, interests and behaviors
audience.customAudience: Use Custom Audiences to reach people who already interacted with your business or lookalike audiences to reach new people similar to your existing customers
audience.inclusionCriteriaEx: Any to expand the audience, All to make it more specific
audience.languageDescription: Your audience size will vary depending on the language selected here. English may be selected as the default language, even in areas where a local language is available, to reach all users in the region.
audience.noPixel: It seems there is no PIXEL on this ad account
audience.atLeastOne: At least one of this values
audience.onlyOne: Enter a value to filter by
audience.targetingExpand: Define your audience by including or excluding demographics, interests and behaviors
audience.fbConnections: Reach people who have a specific kind of connection to your Page, app or event. This will narrow your audience to include only people with that specific connection who also meet the other targeting categories you've selected.
audience.lookalikeSize: You can create multiple lookalikes with different levels of similarity to your source. This allows you to bid differently for audiences with different conversion values.
audience.lookalikeSource: The source that you select will be used to find people who share similar traits

budgetSchedule.type: A daily budget is the average you'll spend every day. A lifetime budget is the maximum you'll spend during the lifetime of your ad set.
budgetSchedule.budget: Your ad set budget is the daily or lifetime amount you want to spend on this ad set
budgetSchedule.spendCap: Set an overall spending limit for your ad campaign. This means your ad sets in the campaign will stop once you've reached your spending limit. This option is not available when using a campaign lifetime budget
budgetSchedule.schedule: You can choose to run your ads continuously starting today or only during a specific date range.
budgetSchedule.dayparting: You can schedule your ads for specific hours and days of the week

delivery.optimizeFor: Choose the event you want to optimize for in your ad set. Your selection affects who sees your ads to get you the desired outcome
delivery.billingEvent: The selected option determines when you pay for your ad. For many optimization goals, you'll pay each time your ad is served (known as an impression)
delivery.bidStrategy: Your bid strategy tells the ad network how to bid for you in ad auctions. Auctions determine which results you get and how much they cost.
delivery.bidStrategyError: You have to select a bidding strategy
delivery.bidLinkedin: Amount to bid (for manual bidding) or amount which is the target cost (for target cost bidding) per click, impression, or other event depending on the pricing model.
delivery.costCap: Set a bid control if you want to control your maximum bid in every auction. If you don't set one, Facebook's ad system will focus on spending your entire budget and getting the most results
delivery.costCapError: The amount should be over 0.01 or more
delivery.accelerated: Accelerated delivery can be useful for time-sensitive promotions. You need to set a bid cap to use accelerated delivery
delivery.cbo: Campaign budget optimization will distribute your budget across ad sets to get more results depending on your delivery optimization choices and bid strategy
delivery.conversionPixel: Select a pixel for the conversion
delivery.maxFrequencyErr: Interval days must be between 1 and 90
delivery.intervalDaysErr: Interval days must be between 1 and 90

facebook.spend: How much you spent in total on your Facebook ads
facebook.clicks: How many clicks your ads received in total on Facebook
facebook.impressions: How many times your ads were viewed in total on Facebook
facebook.reach: How many people have seen your ads at least once on Facebook
facebook.cpm: The average paid for every 1k people viewing your Facebook ads
facebook.cpc: How much paid on average for every ad-click on Facebook
facebook.ctr: The average ratio between clicks and views on your Facebook ads
facebook.frequency: The average number of times each person saw your Facebook ads
facebook.uniqueClicks: The number of unique clicks your ads recevied on Facebook
facebook.socialSpend: The total spent on social actions resulting from your Facebook ads

linkedin.spend: How much you spent in total on your LinkedIn ads
linkedin.clicks: How many clicks your ads received in total on LinkedIn
linkedin.impressions: How many times your ads were viewed in total on LinkedIn
linkedin.reach: How many people have seen your ads at least once on LinkedIn
linkedin.cpm: The average paid for every 1k people viewing your LinkedIn ads
linkedin.cpc: How much paid on average for every ad-click on LinkedIn
linkedin.ctr: The average ratio between clicks and views on your LinkedIn ads
linkedin.frequency: The average number of times each person saw your LinkedIn ads
linkedin.uniqueClicks: The number of unique clicks your ads recevied on LinkedIn
linkedin.socialSpend: The total spent on social actions resulting from your LinkedIn ads

error_codes.default_title: We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
error_codes.default_404: It looks like you’re trying to access a page that has either been deleted or never existed.
error_codes.default_500: It looks like our server had an error
